purpose: Facilitates research and experimentation on social dilemmas using multi-agent reinforcement learning environments.
principle: Implements grid-world environments where agents interact and face social dilemmas, using reinforcement learning algorithms.
reusability: Designed to be easily extended or modified for different social dilemma scenarios, with modular environment components.
limitations: Primarily focused on specific social dilemma scenarios, may require adaptation for other types of multi-agent environments.
name: sequential_social_dilemma_games
description: Repo for reproduction of sequential social dilemmas
highlight: Reproduces sequential social dilemmas for multi-agent reinforcement learning research.
